fullplot: Leanne is salutatorian when she needs to be valedictorian to get her scholarship to Harvard. The only class she is worse than the leader in is history, taught by Mrs. Tingle, and the teacher hates her. When an attempt to get ahead in Mrs. Tingle's class goes awry, mayhem ensues and friendships, loyalties and trust are tested by the teacher's intricate mind-games.
plot: The story of a girl who is willing to do anything to become Valedictorian, even if it means murdering the teacher that stands in her way.
title: Teaching Mrs. Tingle

tomatoes.consensus: As a dark comedy-thriller, this movie lacks humor and thrill.
